PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-06892020-09-28,  ,  ,  PHAC,  HC,  , 
ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Mandatory Isolation), No. 5
PrecisMINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (MANDATORY ISOLATION), NO. 5 in order to (1) support Canadaâ€™s continued focus on reducing the introduction and further spread of COVID-19 by decreasing the risk of importing cases from outside the country; (2) continue applying stringent measures to reduce the spread by persons who do not have symptoms on arrival at the border as well as symptomatic entrants; and (3) extend the effective date of the previous Order until October 31, 2020.
AttachmentsAttachment
